senses.sense_definition: Действительное причастие прошедшего времени от глагола <w>вплести</w>.

examples.text: Мастер, искусно <w>вплётший</w> золотую нить в сложный узор, с гордостью показал свою работу.

target_lang_translations.en: The craftsman, having skillfully <w>woven</w> a golden thread into the intricate pattern, proudly displayed his work.

examples.text: Писатель, органично <w>вплётший</w> в повествование старинные легенды, сделал книгу загадочной.

target_lang_translations.en: The writer, who organically <w>wove</w> ancient legends into the narrative, made the book mysterious.

target_lang_definitions.en: Past active participle of the verb <w>to weave in</w>; describes a subject that has intertwined, braided, or incorporated something into a larger structure or context.

en.target_lang_sense_clarification: participle phrase indicating the completed action of weaving something into a structure
relative clause equivalent describing the subject who performed the action
describing the action of weaving or blending elements together
